headline: Zebra Ventures Makes Strategic Investment in Xemelgo to Support Intelligent Automation
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill. & BELLEVUE, Wash., July 24, 2025--Zebra Ventures, the corporate venture capital investment arm of Zebra Technologies, announced a strategic investment in Xemelgo, a leader in cloud-based RFID software solutions.
